title: Zyxel security advisory (AV25-767)
description: On November 18, 2025, Zyxel published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: 4G LTE/5G NR CPE  multiple versions and models
DSL/Ethernet CPE  multiple versions and models
Fiber ONTs  multiple versions and models
Wireless Extenders  multiple versions and models
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
